history.proof: intros A p. induction p using prechain_rect. - intros m'. apply pre_domok_incr_chain_0. - intros p' IHp' m'. apply pre_domok_incr_chain_1. qsimpl time: 1. sfirstorder depth: 3.

exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set p : prechain A m : Map A IHp : pre_domok_incr_chain_def A p p' : mEnsemble A IHp' : mRelation A m' : prechain_dom_ok A p' (concat A p m) /\\ prechain_incr A IHp' (concat A p m) Unable to unify "mRelation A" with "pre_domok_incr_chain_def A p".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (A : Set) (p : prechain A), pre_domok_incr_chain_def A p

Premises:
Inductive prechain (A : Set) : Set := single : Map A -> prechain A | concat : prechain A -> Map A -> prechain A For prechain: Argument scope is [type_scope] For single: Argument scopes are [type_scope _] For concat: Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _]
Inductive GFormula (TA TX AA AF : Type) : Type := TT : Tauto.GFormula | FF : Tauto.GFormula | X : TX -> Tauto.GFormula | A : TA -> AA -> Tauto.GFormula | Cj : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | D : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | N : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | I : Tauto.GFormula -> option AF -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula For GFormula: Arguments TA, TX, AA, AF are implicit and maximally inserted For TT: Arguments TA, TX, AA, AF are implicit and maximally inserted For FF: Arguments TA, TX, AA, AF are implicit and maximally inserted For X: Arguments TA, TX, AA, AF are implicit and maximally inserted For A: Arguments TA, TX, AA, AF are implicit and maximally inserted For Cj: Arguments TA,
pre_domok_incr_chain_def : forall A : Set, prechain A -> Prop
pre_domok_incr_chain_1 : forall (A : Set) (p : prechain A), pre_domok_incr_chain_def A p -> forall m : Map A, pre_domok_incr_chain_def A (concat A p m)
prechain_sum : forall (A : Set) (p : prechain A), (exists x : Map A, p = single A x) \/ (exists (x : Map A) (y : prechain A), p = concat A y x)
chain_def_ok : forall (A : Set) (T : mEnsemble A) (r : mRelation A) (p : prechain A), chain A T r p -> prechain_dom_ok A T p
chain_incr : forall (A : Set) (T : mEnsemble A) (r : mRelation A) (p : prechain A), chain A T r p -> prechain_incr A r p
pre_domok_incr_chain_0 : forall (A : Set) (m : Map A), pre_domok_incr_chain_def A (single A m)
domok_concat : forall (A : Set) (x : Map A) (T : mEnsemble A) (p : prechain A), T x -> prechain_dom_ok A T p -> prechain_dom_ok A T (concat A p x)
prechain_incr_ind : forall (A : Set) (P : mRelation A -> prechain A -> Prop), (forall (x : Map A) (r : mRelation A), P r (single A x)) -> (forall (x : Map A) (r : mRelation A) (p : prechain A), r (prechain_last A p) x -> prechain_incr A r p -> P r p -> P r (concat A p x)) -> forall (m : mRelation A) (p : prechain A), prechain_incr A m p -> P m p
prechain_dom_ok_ind : forall (A : Set) (P : mEnsemble A -> prechain A -> Prop), (forall (x : Map A) (T : mEnsemble A), T x -> P T (single A x)) -> (forall (x : Map A) (T : mEnsemble A) (p : prechain A), T x -> prechain_dom_ok A T p -> P T p -> P T (concat A p x)) -> forall (m : mEnsemble A) (p : prechain A), prechain_dom_ok A m p -> P m p
incr_concat : forall (A : Set) (x : Map A) (r : mRelation A) (p : prechain A), r (prechain_last A p) x -> prechain_incr A r p -> prechain_incr A r (concat A p x)
prechain_rect : forall (A : Set) (P : prechain A -> Type), (forall m : Map A, P (single A m)) -> (forall p : prechain A, P p -> forall m : Map A, P (concat A p m)) -> forall p : prechain A, P p
prechain_ind : forall (A : Set) (P : prechain A -> Prop), (forall m : Map A, P (single A m)) -> (forall p : prechain A, P p -> forall m : Map A, P (concat A p m)) -> forall p : prechain A, P p
prechain_rec : forall (A : Set) (P : prechain A -> Set), (forall m : Map A, P (single A m)) -> (forall p : prechain A, P p -> forall m : Map A, P (concat A p m)) -> forall p : prechain A, P p
Inductive prechain_incr (A : Set) : mRelation A -> prechain A -> Prop := incr_single : forall (x : Map A) (r : mRelation A), prechain_incr A r (single A x) | incr_concat : forall (x : Map A) (r : mRelation A) (p : prechain A), r (prechain_last A p) x -> prechain_incr A r p -> prechain_incr A r (concat A p x) For prechain_incr: Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _] For incr_single: Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _] For incr_concat: Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _ _ _ _]
Inductive prechain_dom_ok (A : Set) : mEnsemble A -> prechain A -> Prop := domok_single : forall (x : Map A) (T : mEnsemble A), T x -> prechain_dom_ok A T (single A x) | domok_concat : forall (x : Map A) (T : mEnsemble A) (p : prechain A), T x -> prechain_dom_ok A T p -> prechain_dom_ok A T (concat A p x) For prechain_dom_ok: Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _] For domok_single: Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _ _] For domok_concat: Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _ _ _ _]
chain_ind : forall (A : Set) (P : mEnsemble A -> mRelation A -> prechain A -> Prop), (forall (x : Map A) (T : mEnsemble A) (r : mRelation A), T x -> P T r (single A x)) -> (forall (x y : Map A) (T : mEnsemble A) (r : mRelation A), T x -> T y -> r x y -> P T r (concat A (single A x) y)) -> (forall (x y : Map A) (z : prechain A) (T : mEnsemble A) (r : mRelation A), T y -> r x y -> chain A T r (concat A z x) -> P T r (concat A z x) -> P T r (concat A (concat A z x) y)) -> forall (m : mEnsemble A) (m0 : mRelation A) (p : prechain A), chain A m m0 p -> P m m0 p
Pos.iter_swap : forall (p : positive) (A : Type) (f : A -> A) (x : A), Pos.iter f (f x) p = f (Pos.iter f x p)
incr_single : forall (A : Set) (x : Map A) (r : mRelation A), prechain_incr A r (single A x)
chain_concat_m : forall (A : Set) (x y : Map A) (z : prechain A) (T : mEnsemble A) (r : mRelation A), T y -> r x y -> chain A T r (concat A z x) -> chain A T r (concat A (concat A z x) y)
domok_single : forall (A : Set) (x : Map A) (T : mEnsemble A), T x -> prechain_dom_ok A T (single A x)
chain_single : forall (A : Set) (x : Map A) (T : mEnsemble A) (r : mRelation A), T x -> chain A T r (single A x)
MapCard_Put1_equals_2 : forall (A : Type) (p : positive) (a a' : ad) (y y' : A), MapCard A (MapPut1 A a y a' y' p) = 2
Pos.iter_swap_gen : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (g : A -> A) (h : B -> B), (forall a : A, f (g a) = h (f a)) -> forall (p : positive) (a : A), f (Pos.iter g a p) = Pos.iter h (f a) p
chain_concat_s : forall (A : Set) (x y : Map A) (T : mEnsemble A) (r : mRelation A), T x -> T y -> r x y -> chain A T r (concat A (single A x) y)
Ptestbit_Pbit : forall (p : positive) (n : nat), Pos.testbit p (N.of_nat n) = Pos.testbit_nat p n
concat : forall A : Set, prechain A -> Map A -> prechain A

```coq
intros A p.
induction p using prechain_rect.
- intros m. apply pre_domok_incr_chain_0.
- intros p' IHp' m. apply pre_domok_incr_chain_1. apply IHp'.
Qed.
```
